nodes.text: Neil Edwards is the editor of the Blaster section of Star Wars Insider. He took over as editor of the section in Star Wars Insider 114, but was not credited as such until Star Wars Insider 115. From Star Wars Insider 117 onwards, he has also been the writer of the Classic Moment feature each issue.
A lifelong Star Wars fan, he also edits Titan Magazines' official Supernatural magazine.
